channel.title: Cryptography Update on Skycoin Updates
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptography Update on Skycoin Updates

item.title: Development Update #36
item.description: Summary: We are exhausted. We just finished 4th cryptography audit. Some minor issues were found and fixed. All the issue involved impossible conditions, but are fixed anyways. Cryptography Audit/Changes: Fixed: Someone with a private key from a deterministic wallet who is able to do a SHA256 preimage attack was able to derive all subsequent keys in deterministic wallet (but not the keys for addresses preceding). SHA256 preimage attacks are currently impossible but may become an issue in thirty years.
